forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy, with a high near 51. Southeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Rain Showers Likely then Areas Of Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 7pm, then areas of fog and a chance of rain showers. Cloudy. Low around 38, with temperatures rising to around 46 overnight. South southwest wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before noon, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 50, with temperatures falling to around 38 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 8 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 47 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: The Snow Crew turned the guns on last night. Despite some cold temperatures in the area the conditions at Nub's Nob allowed for only a few hours of quality snowmaking. The team is here around the clock, ready for the next opportunity. At this point it looks like there is a turn toward colder weather right around Thanksgiving. We will continue to update the blog to keep you up to date. Think COLD and SNOW.
